functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: afterWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Handle after ETH withdrawal from the SGRToken contract operation.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account which has issued the operation.

parameterDecorators.name: _wallet
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the withdrawal wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: _priorWithdrawEthBalance
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH in the SGRToken contract prior the withdrawal.

parameterDecorators.name: _afterWithdrawEthBalance
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH in the SGRToken contract after the withdrawal.
